attributes.additional_details: This would bring in tons of taxes and could ease the pressure on the NHS and save pharmaceutical medicines for people that require them more and that don't find relief in CBD
attributes.background: Its time for parliament to allow patients with a long list of ailments and illnesses to have access to a medicine that works for them. Its time to at least have a debate on the healing properties of hemp flowers rather that shutting down the  discourse as the government has kept doing thus far.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599179
